message: Anyone else frustrated by the wait. I ordered mine at like 5am release day and have to wait till April 21 come on
That sucks, I ordered my wife's around 7pm release day and it says it is out for delivery today, good luck to you
If I were you I'd be tryin to buy one in store and then cancel your order
It was bought for me though so I guess I have to wait. On the bright side the cover is ready for shipping
@Closey I ordered online and then canceled my order when I got lucky in store. I understand your frustration. Apple does tend to exaggerate their ship times, so you may get it early.
@Closey And it's well worth the wait.
Finally got it today boy was it worth it. ITunes is gonna get a few of my hard earned dollars though
@Closey Congrats, you're going to love it.
I think I will buy one with my severance pay from work when I find my next job.
